insert-new-streamer-twitch: INSERT INTO streamers (streamer_id, login, display_name, description, profile_image_url, offline_image_url, date_first_scraped, date_last_scraped) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update-existing-streamer-twitch: UPDATE streamers SET login=?, display_name=?, description=?, profile_image_url=?, offline_image_url=?, date_last_scraped=? WHERE streamer_id={streamer_id};
insert-game-twitch: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO games (game_id, game_name, box_art_url) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
insert-tag-twitch: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO tags (tag_id, is_auto, english_name, localization_names, english_description, localization_descriptions) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-livestream-snapshot-twitch: INSERT INTO livestream_snapshots (livestream_id, streamer_id, game_id, viewers, date_started, date_scraped, tag_ids, language) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-game-snapshot-twitch: INSERT INTO game_snapshots (game_id, date_scraped, num_streamers, num_zero, total_viewers, min_viewers, max_viewers, median_viewers, mean_viewers, std_dev_viewers) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-log-twitch: INSERT INTO logs (log_name, date_started, date_ended, timelogs, stats) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert-total-views-for-streamer-twitch: INSERT INTO total_views (streamer_id, date_scraped, value) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
insert-broadcaster-type-for-streamer-twi: INSERT INTO broadcaster_type (streamer_id, date_scraped, value) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
insert-followers-count-twitch: INSERT INTO followers (streamer_id, date_scraped, value) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
insert-livestream-twitch: INSERT INTO livestreams (livestream_id, streamer_id, game_id, date_started, date_ended, tag_ids, max_viewers, min_viewers, average_viewers, viewer_counts) VALUES  (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
